Reviews.Title: “Crappy hotel”
Reviews.Author: Eli S
Reviews.Content: am writing miserable experience hotels couple days ago worst experience hotel 40 travelling booked agodacom 4 hotel 2 nice vacation wife children chose hotel town centre seeing fantastic reviews hotel received arrived 6th april 2pm 5 hours flight adjacent 221 222 walked immediately realized resemble looked web page window facing sewer pipes entire building photo enclosed aircondition ventilation immediately refused accept told reservation manager adrian acceptable adrian agreed bad apologized night booked stay night adrian suggested luggage night necessity morning adequate tired journey hungry choice accepted offer biggest mistake spent night terrible hardly sleep window air hear toilet flush night am tall tall couldnt stretch bed short bed morning reception adrian girl reception named martha told adrian vacation didnt tell replace try course booked replace needless cheated humiliated martha perfect girl bad news encountered hotel receptionist unpleasant im polite call adrian promised noon told tried calling adrian 3 times responding phone heard ridiculous lie tried getting hold agoda mail enclosed 24 hour service disappointed agoda recommending hotel looks nice nicely located am nice reason agoda customers accommodated third class 3 days disaster bath tab flush couldnt shower dirt pipes including cockroaches pictures sent 3 times bell boy tried pump sink success taking 4 shower third night worst hot air moving practically suffocated solution air tiny window main door corridor air circulated light corridor night noise toilets flushing night air breath thats spent nights morning wife sleeping night crying trying talk hotel manager told 4 days tried getting hold adrian offered replace night stay offer sympathy understanding dream vacation barcelona nightmare completely destroyed enjoy beauty city waiting plain eli 20 st israel
